DESCRIPTION:
Become Mad Max, a lonely warrior in a wild post-apocalyptic world where the key to survival - a car. In this world full of dangers, the action takes place from a third party. To survive in the wasteland, you have to fight, taking part in melee battles against the car and bandit gangs. Max - indomitable hero and desperate fighter, the only thing he wants - to leave the madness behind and find solace in the legendary "Silent Plain." Players will go through many treacherous missions deeper and deeper exploring the vast expanses of wasteland in search of stocks and materials for building fault-free and perfect fighting machine.
